title: Hacking the World Bank (Update)
description: Jim Yong Kim has an unorthodox background for a World Bank president — and his reign has been just as unorthodox. He has just announced he’s stepping down, well before his term is over; we recorded this interview with him in 2015.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
